DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Weight range 50 100 kg inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 26 kg/m2 Has know sensitivity benzodiazepine , flumazenil , anesthetic agent , medical condition agent contraindicate With evidence uncontrolled renal , hepatic , central nervous system , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic dysfunction , opinion investigator medical monitor Has know suspect history alcoholism drug abuse misuse within 6 month Screening evidence tolerance physical dependence dose study drug With history laboratory result show presence hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBs Ag ) , hepatitis C antibody ( HCV Ab ) , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Pregnant , lactate Mallampati score ≥3
